website_summaries.verdict: Quick setup and fast loading times provide fantastic ultra-high-definition viewing. Great option if you own a 4K TV.
pros: Good price for 4K video plus the same access to other streaming services and channels
Crisp, clear picture quality with smooth streaming
cons: Some problems connecting to surround sound systems
Could have problems with audio syncing

website_summaries.verdict: Although I prefer slightly more-expensive devices with better features, the Roku Premiere is still an appealing way to add more 4K apps to TVs that lack HDR.
pros: The Premiere is cheaper than most other 4K streamers and offers more 4K apps
Unlike the Chromecast Ultra, it actually includes a remote (and an Amazon Video app)
Roku's ecosystem offers more apps, better search and more customization than any other
cons: Lack of HDR and other important features make it a worse value than the Premiere+
Content in 4K is still uncommon, and your 4K TV probably already has compatible apps
Some app interfaces are less polished than on rival devices

customer_reviews.title: Much better connectivity to WiFi than the Fire Stick.
customer_reviews.text: Bought three Amazon Fire Sticks, all three have been junk. Amazon replaced a couple of them, but finally got so sick of the constant connectivity issues over WiFi that I bought this instead. What an improvement, and my only regret is that I didn't buy the Roku months ago. Would have saved a lot of frustration with the Fire Stick.
customer_reviews.author: Joel P

customer_reviews.title: More apps than what's included in Smart TV's.
customer_reviews.text: We have owned around 9 Roku's over the past several years. We now also have two TLC TV's with built-in Roku. I prefer to use Roku rather than the Smart TV apps because Roku tends to have more apps that are not always available on Smart TV's. The Roku remote is also much simpler and intuitive to use compared to the complicated TV remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Parallax

customer_reviews.title: Love Roku, just be sure to purchase the HD connector cable.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th Roku..they really do last a long time, but they also upgrade from time to time, and I like to catch up. It is a great product which lets me see movies and shows from Netflix, Amazon, etc. The Rokus I bought in the past had all the wires, connectors, etc included in the package. This new one does not include the HD connection cable,so be sure to order one. I am far from a techie and break into a sweat just thinking about connecting something new...Roku makes it easy even for me, so don't worry about the setup. Just set up the new one, and honestly, if I can do it, anyone can
customer_reviews.author: BookaholicTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: and I have never been disappointed. The picture quality is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have had the ROKU streaming boxes for years, and I have never been disappointed. The picture quality is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Letcat

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid for it at Amazon this is a very good product. I thought the remote was a bit wanting until I removed the protective plastic from the front. Improved remote performance considerably 😀. I like that you only activate services you use as opposed to being bombarded by the logos of every service out there everytime. Another review I read mentioned a 3.5mm jack in the remote. Must have been reviewing a different model as my remote is lacking such a jack. Good product. Sturdy remote that will Outlast the tech most likely.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: I love Roku.. I hate THIS Roku
customer_reviews.text: I started with a Roku then got a Roku 3 and for no reason upgraded and got this one. This one, unlike the others.. drops the wireless signal every single time the TV is turned off or the source is switched to a different media. Every.single.time (sigh). Must be unplugged and rebooted.... every.single.time. I love Roku (no complaints), I just hate THIS Roku. Thinking of just plugging my 3 back in and tossing this one in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: S. Day

customer_reviews.title: The remote makes me cranky
customer_reviews.text: The remote for this Roku is particularly sensitive. I feel like I have to hold it just so to get it to function. Of our many Roku units this is the most expensive so I was expecting more from the remote. I have a tendency to use the app on my phone to avoid irritation. This is our 5th Roku since we started using Roku almost 10 years ago. We LOVE Roku in my home. Would have given 5 stars, but I cannot get over the remote!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: 9.2 update mess
customer_reviews.text: Lastest Roku version update 9.2 released in September of 2019 causes the Roku to be have display issues with 4K video. The issue has been reported by many users including myself of the Roku forums. I've noticed the issue consistently affect users with AVR's between the Roku and the 4k display. The 9.1 update was great and stable and never had any issues. However the 9.2 update have been a mess. Roku staff is aware of the users complaints but are ignoring the issue. It goes to show you what type of company Roku has become and I cannot recommend you buy any Roku product.
customer_reviews.author: Juan lopez

customer_reviews.title: Having to reset every day! :(
customer_reviews.text: I Set it up and it worked flawlessly. I was so excited.....then I turned off the TV for the night. When I woke up the next day and turned it on, the screen was all fuzzy like there wasn't a good cord connection. So I unplugged and reset it, no big deal. SAME THING TODAY when I turned it back on. I'm irritated as he!! right now. I hope I don't have to reset it to get the darn thing to work on a daily basis. Even if resetting from the remote were an option, I could even live with that. I don't see that option either.
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: I'll choose Roku every time.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Roku, Amazon Fire TV, Western Digital (WD), & ChromeCast. My favorite interface is Roku because it is simple yet effective. Amazon Fire TV is a bit cluttered and surprisingly confusing to set up. They sort of over-simplified it. WD is a waste of money. ChromeCast is great for when I want to cast something to the tv from my laptop though it can conflict with the Roku so do not have them both plugged in at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: deytech

customer_reviews.title: Superb Product
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed streaming DVD players because mine was always freezing. All models had the same problem, so I decided to try this Roku & I am so glad I did! This little guy is much, much faster that a streaming DVD player & no freezes at all. The picture clarity & sound are excellent. I whole-heartedly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture, but has Audio problems
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Roku’s for years. Our Roku 3 has been almost flawless. The first movie I watched on Netflix, the audio went out multiple times. It’s not my 2017 Samsung TV either. The next movie I watched a week later on Amazon Prime did the same thing. Audio kept cutting out. The only thing that got the audio back on was pausing the movie and pressing play again. Very frustrating when you’re trying to watch a movie or TV show. The Forums on Roku’s website actually have this as an issue for this 2016 Premiere device, and state that update 7.7.0 fixed it. However, the problem still persist with 8.1.0 Build 4159.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Should work MUCH BETTER for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is as slow as the 2012 XD it replaced. Takes for ever to load channels on PSVue. Will lock up and reboot after several hours watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. M.

customer_reviews.title: A Serious Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Roku, which I wanted to replace. This version has some great features--the ability to use headphones on the remote and great menu options--but it has the issue of constantly shifting the aspect ratio on my TV. The visuals go out for a second or two every few minutes, while the sound keeps going. I have a Firestick on that TV as well, and I have no such problems with it. At this point, I only use it as a backup (or when I want to watch TV late at night using headphones). Would not buy again until they fix this glitch.
customer_reviews.author: otowngrl81

customer_reviews.title: Awesome upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I replaced my older generation Roku with this one. Setup was easy. I chose this one instead of the Ultra because it includes most of the features available on the upper model. Best things about this product: I can control it with the Roku app on my smartphone in case I can't find my remote (happens often) and this remote has a headphone jack for night listening. Sound and picture quality are great on this unit!
customer_reviews.author: tayybee

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: The Roku is a mainstay in our home, we have 5 of them. This version seems to take a step backwards regarding the remote. My older version is the xs and the remote doesn't need to have a direct line to the devise to work. That is nice if you wdnt to mount it in the back of the tv. It also doesn't have a Ethernet port. I didn't think it would matter. I have had some problems with wireless connections, they just don't seem to connect as well as the xs.
customer_reviews.author: T Yearg

customer_reviews.title: Don't understand the bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Roku one that kept losing the signal. I finally ordered this Roku and I couldn't be happier. It absolutely works perfect. I honestly do not understand the bad reviews because I plugged this product in and have not had a bit of trouble. It sure has my vote.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: I am VERY pleased with the idea of streaming and getting rid of ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this Roku player in the family room and the Roku express in two of our bedrooms. Actually, I don't see much difference between the two other then cost. I am VERY pleased with the idea of streaming and getting rid of the high cost of cable!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Like my previous model much better
customer_reviews.text: No ethernet port is a big problem. The response with the remote is very slow - always has a hesitation. We replace batteries and no difference. Not impressed. Like my previous model much better. I will be returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fusek

customer_reviews.title: the one was horrible 3 was great so upgraded the 1 to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a Roku 3 and 1 ... the one was horrible 3 was great so upgraded the 1 to the premiere and it is a nice unit. Faster than the others clean home screen and nice touch of logging in and it automatically loaded my channels and walked me through registering it on Amazon... well worth the money like it better than sticks and once again Roku 1 interface was horrible and hard to transition between rooms once you had the 3
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy having this
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy having this, my cable bill went up over 300$. I immediately canceled and subscribed to Sling, I already had Hulu and Netflix which all together cost $50-$60. So I saved almost 200 a month with getting this where all the apps I use are in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L. Provost

customer_reviews.title: A great unit just like my other 2 Rokus
customer_reviews.text: Works great like my other 2 Rokus (though my other 2 are the quad core roku sticks). I needed this new one because I got an additional tv. Configuration was pretty easy as expected. Remote works fine. This remote in infrared, so you actually have to aim in the general direction of the Roku unit (my roku sticks use network-connected remotes so you don't have to have line-of-sight for use). But it's all good. I am happy with this unit so far.
customer_reviews.author: Beavis Comeavis

customer_reviews.title: Much faster than my Firestick and I love how the remote has buttons to jump to Netflix ...
customer_reviews.text: Much faster than my Firestick and I love how the remote has buttons to jump to Netflix and Sling which we use the most. Only dislike I have is the remote is infrared instead of WiFi which means it must have line of sight unlike the Firestick.
customer_reviews.author: Peezr

customer_reviews.title: Just get a roku 3.
customer_reviews.text: Roku 3 is far superior. I feel like this was pushed junk. This also showed roku has given up on games. Which is said. Maybe if they got past c++. They could have a more suited platform. Still they could develop some kind of games. Really slacking. Money waiting to be made. Anyways this roku was a bust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I do believe the Premiere has better resolution and I like the layout better
customer_reviews.text: Have older, bottom of the line Roku units but when I added a new subscription I learned they were not compatible so I purchased this model. Had I not been required to upgrade I don't know that it would be worth it, but I do believe the Premiere has better resolution and I like the layout better. I have noticed the old units seems to lag and struggle these days but the Premiere is much more smooth and has a nicer looking GUI.
customer_reviews.author: J. Haden

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity at its best. Set up was as simple as connecting a ...
customer_reviews.text: Simplicity at its best. Set up was as simple as connecting a cable. The interface is very user-friendly and the selection of channels, paid and free, are extensive. The video quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: gnlmiami

customer_reviews.title: Worst media player ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing never worked well. Plex may work, it may not - it's a roll of the dice. Now the latest upgrade to the Plex app broke the version of Plex server i've had running. This thing is absolutely worthless and has been nothing but frustration from the second I bought it. I'm going to run over it with my car but it will probably be like a Chuckie doll that won't die. Piece of GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Brocktoon The Great

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is just as good as my fire tv, if the fire tv supported the Spectrum app it would be perfect. The speed is excellent no lag at all very responsive, I have more than enough channels and apps to choose from free and paid to keep entertained for days. Now it’s time to turn in my non dvr cable boxes and save
customer_reviews.author: BURNS B

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the best of the streaming devices
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best of the streaming devices. Easy to use interface, extensive list of available channels (if you kind find what you're looking for here, you have some bizarre viewing habits lol). Highly recommend Roku!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Roku sets standard for streaming units.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Roku. this is the second unit I have gotten for the house. I have the 4K ultra for my main entertainment area bought this for the bedroom. Does connect to WiFi AC, no Ethernet ports though. Sync'd with my Roku account and installed all the channels and setting from my main unit. Made setting it up very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Spartacus219

customer_reviews.title: shop around for another device and pass on this one.
customer_reviews.text: The past several months there has been a lot of pausing with this device. Had it cost $15=$20 I would not complain but at $65...looks like it costs $72 now, I could certainly not recommend this device. Also, others have had similar issues. Very disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: spyman7

customer_reviews.title: Is OK
customer_reviews.text: I have to re-start the unit once in a while. It tells me that the resolution is not supported. I have a 4K HD TV, but this was automatically configured then the unit was first installed , so it works well, but like I said a re-start of the Roku device fixes it. The unit has the latest updates..
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: You get YouTube with Roku, I love it. Good by AT&T.
customer_reviews.text: This is the way to go. Get rid of your cable TV. You must have Internet. You can watch just about anything you want through YouTube. The apps. that are downloaded on Roku on a scale from 1 - 10, I would rate them a 3 if not less. We watch Fox News through YouTube. They do have a Fox News app. downloaded, it's segments not really up to date. I'm thankful for YouTube. They do have a QVC app. that one is just for her..
customer_reviews.author: Jadabug

customer_reviews.title: Love my Roku!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Roku! Also have Amazon Prime + I get lots of channels. Much cheaper than paying for cable every month.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen C Olsen

customer_reviews.title: We wanted to give DirecTV Now a try but we ...
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to give DirecTV Now a try but we had to upgrade our Roku to do so. Wow, should have done this a long time ago! The Premiere version works so well with SlingTV, PlayStationVue and DirecTV Now. We have another older Roku and I will be upgrading it shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M.

customer_reviews.title: and is a great way to cut the chord
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Roku. It works perfectly, and is a great way to cut the chord. I also own a Roku television and I just love the UI and the remote is perfectly simple. I do wish, as do many others, that the bottom quick access buttons were customizable. The only one of the four I use is Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Pendegrass

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Way to Cut the Cord
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and look to the box. Super fast and intuitive interface makes it easy to navigate and find new content. Well done. Just wish it had the old DirecTV app for streaming (I didn't do my research enough), but come May 2018, cutting the cord for 100% streaming. Great price and value out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: K-Rome

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cord Cutters!
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. As a long term cord cutter, I found myself really missing some of my former favorite channels. Roku in combination with DirecTV Now I can avoid cable fees, pay for only what I want, and have access to TONS of free content. The device delivers steady streaming with no buffering, a clean UHD picture, and is really easy to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: kellyd7011

customer_reviews.title: A+ for an easy addition to a home
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Very easy setup for my father. The only concern I have with the Roku is there isn't an Off and on Switch. If the Roku freezes up or whatnot, you have to unplug it from the back of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: MISSING HDMI CABLE...possible used product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these units. Advice: Go to the computer to activate and not the mobile way. I ended up reaching someone in India for Roku support who told me my ip address had been accessed by China and wanted money to create a firewall. Once I logged in on the computer it was fine. Also one of these might have been previously used. The batteries were already in the remote and it didn't come with the HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It's much better than the smaller one, but you still have to pay to use most of the outlets, or have cable or satellite to use certain of the outlets. The two that I can use are Amazon & Netflix.. Had to join Prime and Netflix to get those two, but they are cheaper than getting cable or satellite. I'll go for this every time.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Winges

customer_reviews.title: Very happy Roku user!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Roku Premiere. It's easy to set up and easy to use. Have not had any problems with it and plan to remove all the premium cable channels. I do recommend downloading the app to use on your tablet or phone rather than the Roku remote. My husband has found so many shows he likes that are not on cable. Plus he likes that he can now watch YouTube on the big television. I bought the second Roku for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Shops!

customer_reviews.title: ... more and with the Roku and a few subscriptions like Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.text: We do not have cable television any more and with the Roku and a few subscriptions like Amazon Prime, we do not miss it. The Roku is so easy to set up and makes selecting add-on subscriptions it just seems like a no-brainer. We will continue to use the Roku devices unless something better comes along in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Cat and dog loverTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great option vs a cable box.
customer_reviews.text: Cable company encrypted the feed and I had the option to rent a cable box or buy an alternative. Enter the Roku. It was able to use the Spectrum app with ease. Netflix also works flawlessly. No problems with setup or even after switching routers.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shuey

customer_reviews.title: Great streaming device!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product with the hopes of getting rid of cable. So far I am pleased with the product. There are a lot of free channels however you still have to pay for subscriptions to some of the channels like Discovery and HGTV. Despite this I am not disappointed. There is a free trial to Sling and I plan on giving it a try before I cut my cable.
customer_reviews.author: CTExpat2014

customer_reviews.title: Not what you think
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine in the beginning and now has the flashing black screen issue which is all over the ROKU support pages. Garbage company that they can’t fix the issue. Also seems to lag when streaming tv like Hulu, Sling, etc. tried the TV services on a neighbors Apple TV 4K and worked seamlessly. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Sieks

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: When Xfinity raised my bill $35 bucks due to equipment price increases, I decided to try Roku. I do not like tech anything. I can’t believe how easy they were to install/setup.
customer_reviews.author: It's a cin

customer_reviews.title: The king of streaming...
customer_reviews.text: Roku is known as the king of streaming for a reason. I deployed this in our home theater setup, and couldn't be happier! My only qualm: it doesn't power off completely. That being said, I understand this tradeoff is related to the need for on-demand connectivity for fast loading.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Works good but not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Roku works great but there are very limited shows and movies that are UHD or 4K that you do not have to pay for. Maybe in a few months there will be more. I would have rather saved the money and went with the less expensive Roku, or the Amazon Firestick.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: ... myself using roku more than fire tv which is funny to me because i use to have a roku ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy this because fire tv doesnt have bein connect and now i find myself using roku more than fire tv which is funny to me because i use to have a roku and then switched to the fire tv. Roku is a solid streaming box. Also i recieved the premiere plus inside the premier box. But im not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Ad

customer_reviews.title: Finally I am able to watch all the channels I ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally I am able to watch all the channels I want without having to pay hundreds of dollars in cable
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Best tiny box i've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten to experience the 4K but I really enjoy this streaming device. It's fast and responsive. Prior to purchasing this I'd have to wait, usually impatiently, for whichever TV to load Netflix, Hulu, Vudu, etc. Roku is quick and loads within seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Dux

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this device!
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is good but I keep losing audio which requires unplugging it and restarting. Extremely aggravating!! I have other Roku devices on other TV'S and don't have this problem. Of course it didn't start until after the return period had passed. Would not recommend this device!
customer_reviews.author: JBarl

customer_reviews.title: Glad we got the new one
customer_reviews.text: Big improvement over the old version. Couldn't be easier to set up, and has worked without any issues. Only replaced the old one because it was having trouble maintaining a connection and needed to be reset fairly regularly. Glad we did it, I didn't realize how much better this one would be!
customer_reviews.author: Cat owner

customer_reviews.title: does what its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: for the most part this roku works pretty well. I just want to be able to stream movies in HD quality and this fits the bill. The problem is occasionally things get weird like user interface not responding, or audio issues and requires a reboot.
customer_reviews.author: Evans

customer_reviews.title: Remote control very simple but easy to use and it works in every point of ...
customer_reviews.text: Meet expectations : very responsive and quick interface. Remote control very simple but easy to use and it works in every point of the room. I use a lot for Netflix, no issues, non crashes etcc. and very high quality video including h265. Below expectations : most channels are unknown, no spotify, and Plex is limited. Some bug with Plex: no audio sometime.. it needs reboot. I was looking for the perfect video streamer... good, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Edoardo Accenti

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy streaming box to set up. I have 2 Apple TV’s and an Amazon Fire stick and none were as easy to set up. The picture quality is awesome, and I experienced no loading issues and the videos were absolutely smooth
customer_reviews.author: STEVE

customer_reviews.title: Overall a Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the Roku Premiere and would give it 5 stars. This was our second one (first one still working on a second tv). However this one stopped working after about 3 weeks (why I only gave it 3 stars). At first we had to reset it, worked about 1 day and then it just stopped altogether. My money was refunded quickly. I would buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: BP Acres

customer_reviews.title: Older Roku seemed to have a better connection to the remote
customer_reviews.text: Remote is "jumpy"...You hit the button once to advance to next title and it will skip ahead several titles. Must point directly at the Roku for the remote to work. Older Roku seemed to have a better connection to the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Harris

customer_reviews.title: Can you say "constant buffering?"
customer_reviews.text: Can you say "constant buffering?" We have fiber internet, so speed is definitely not the issue. We don't have time warner internet, so purposeful bandwidth throttling by the internet provider is not the issue. The product simply sucks. Amazon fire compared to Roku? Better but also has buffering issues. Apple TV compared to Roku? Nirvana!
customer_reviews.author: David Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the remote
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I don't like that the remote has to be pointed directly at the box to work. Pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.author: JWH

customer_reviews.title: Good device to stream with
customer_reviews.text: Wish the remote didn't have to be pointed directly at it to change channels. We have the stick on other tv and it's nice not having to point. This flat screen is older version so the plug is on back of tv where you can't reach so we had to go with the box but other then that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I prefer the one with the head phones after getting this one. I have had 4 rokus I keep giving them to my friends and family. I got this one for me and I should have purchased the one with headphones. I have had bothe. They all provide great tv service.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Needed an additional Amazon Firestick, but they were out ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed an additional Amazon Firestick, but they were out of stock. Chose the Roku partially because it supports IR remotes and works with my universal remote for TV, Soundbar, etc. Very impressed by speed and navigation of streaming apps, just wish Amazon Prime Music was available on it though. Otherwise can't go wrong with either Fire TV or Roku.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 weeks then quit. Thought it was the remote so I ordered a replacement but that doesn't work either. Can't get past the main selection screen. Complete piece of junk. And no support available from Roku. Threw box away so can't return it. Soooo disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Zullo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one for the apartment...my older one still works perfectly, and I have been using it for 5 years! I have never had an issue or been disappointed by this product. Now I have one for my bedroom and one in the living room, and I use them more than I watch cable. I move twice a year, and all I have to do is unplug it and go. No new setup except to hook up to my new wifi if I am using a different wireless router. SO EASY and useful!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Bye Chromecasr
customer_reviews.text: I am not a techy person by no means, but after talking to our IT guy, he explained why we were having such bad freezing and buffering issues with our ChromeCast. We've had this for a few month now and are happy with no buffering and clarity. I am definitely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Stick with older version
customer_reviews.text: I let be Roku, used them for years but this one is horrible . I keep having to unplug and restart it or my screen goes black, and it’s not the TV because it does the same thing on other TVs . Older model was more reliable and better built.
customer_reviews.author: robyn shulman

customer_reviews.title: Broke up with DirecTV for a better picture. Couldn't be happier with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Broke up with DirecTV for a better picture. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kh

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my Roku Premiere
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my Roku Premiere! It's so easy to set up and to use. On the Roku website,you can just click on all the TV you could ever want to watch, and most of it is free. Then it just shows up on your TV screen, ready to select and watch when you're ready. Love the remote, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless.  Roku has blocked all streaming media apps
customer_reviews.text: Roku has blocked all streaming media apps. The device is worthless now, as you can’t get any content on it. 6 months after purchasing mine, I'm now tossing it in trash. Look elsewhere for streaming media devices.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: This works great, but the way hulu is set up is ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great, but the way hulu is set up is less convenient than the older model we have on our other tv. I like the older one because it's easier to stroll through the watch list. The Roku itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Kinlock

customer_reviews.title: Love my Roku!
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version of the Roku and ignored all of the upgrade emails thinking it wouldn't matter. Then I finally decided to upgrade and it was so worth it. It's so much faster and has an easier menu to navigate. The upgrade was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie J.

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself...over and over again!
customer_reviews.text: Third Roku I've purchased. We've cut the cable and gone wireless in the house now with Roku, Plex and DirecTv Now. Nice having a device that pays for itself month after month!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Roku is perfect for my 'non-smart' TV! A great alternative to cable!
customer_reviews.author: Ski

customer_reviews.title: Functions well and pretty much as expected
customer_reviews.text: Functions well and pretty much as expected. However, absolutely hated being forced to provide my credit card information, when all of the services I use are either paid for via other means outside Roku (e.g. Amazon Prime), or are free.
customer_reviews.author: Buck Turgidson

customer_reviews.title: You need this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 Roku and liked it so much I bought 3 more and a TV with Roku built in. I use the Spectrum app on the TV in the garage, up stairs and on the deck without running cable. Now, Spectrum is going all digital you won’t be able to watch without a box. Instead of renting a box I can buy a Roku for one months rent.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Roku Premiere and it works great. Got this one for my mom as a Christmas gift and have one myself. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: David Adams

customer_reviews.title: Best Roku yet
customer_reviews.text: I just got 2 of these to replace my 5+ year old original ones and these are much more reliable. Now I can watch my Adventist channels without the interrupts I experience with the old units.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I have used Roku products for quite some time and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Roku products for quite some time and of course when we ordered a new 55 inch Samsung 4k ultra hd series 8000 tv we ordered a new roku with it. I get a continuously popping up purple screen that says hdcp unauthorized. I have trouble shooting since Feb. Today I have decided to disconnect roku and use something else.
customer_reviews.author: John R Gould

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Works so beautifully. Great upgrade from my older Roku. Layout similar, but easier to use. Perfect for me, with no cable access. Recommend this for anyone and everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: bought our upstairs movie room. Working great so far. We did have a electronic guy put it in. You have to have an acct with app.
customer_reviews.author: jayhawk

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with the RF remote
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have looked a bit closer and went ahead and pruchased the next higher end model. this one does not come with the RF remote. You can not listen with ear buds on the remote. Its just a simple IR remote. Still love ROKU.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good device - unless streaming 4K - save you money and go Express
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really seem to offer anything over the Express which is 1/3 the cost. Still though, love the fact we cut the cable. Been a year and I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, if you get a good one.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the features on this versus my old Roku device. However, these things seem to only want to last for the warranty period. I began having issues with the sound being so bad you couldn't even listed to it. Tried different cables to no avail. The issue seems to be intermittent.
customer_reviews.author: D Brian Hunsicker

customer_reviews.title: Still loving it
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace Roku 2. I think the 2 just could t keep up with the data flow, it felt super hot all the time like it was going to spontaneously combust. Bought this to put in my room and moved my Roku 3 to my daughters room to replace the 2. The premiere is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to get the shows that I want ...
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to get the shows that I want and have ones that I don't watch. And the cost is great. Wish I would have found it sooner I would have saved not paying for cable.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Woolley

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the performance
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a bit confusing at times, as we are and older couple and not too tech savvy. We replaced our 6 year old Roku,, and are glad we did. This one seems faster and has more features.
customer_reviews.author: Betty37

customer_reviews.title: you're better off with a good android based media player
customer_reviews.text: Roku is it's own thing. IMO, you're better off with a good android based media player. I guess if you have a technophobe on your gift list, this might be the streaming media player to get...
customer_reviews.author: MI User

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great with an idiot proof step by step to install; it should pose no challenge to you or your friends with the exception of your family doctor.
customer_reviews.author: A. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: My favorite streaming box.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the premier specifically so we could use it with a universal remote. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: Really love this -- great way to access Netflix
customer_reviews.text: Really love this -- great way to access Netflix, HBO Now and a ton of other stuff. It's small, runs cool enough, and works just fine. Generally prefer the remote on my phone to the remote that comes with it, but it's convenient to have the hard remote when I don't want to keep waking up my phone while watching a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. It provides a lot of options free and paid programing. Our smart TV WI Fi card went out again and it was did not seem to be supported by a lot of the programs anymore. Easy to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: flowerpowerrkr

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy setup I have had this over a month an haven't had a problem yet I was surprised to see how small it was but does a big job
customer_reviews.author: Edward C Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Remote particularly nice.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and works great. Having the power and volume controls for the TV added to the remote means I don't have to use my TV remote at all anymore. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: gcolvard

customer_reviews.title: Private listening can be a bit frustrating, other than that great
customer_reviews.text: I had the Roku 3 and updated to this device because of 4K streaming and private listening (where you can use headphones through the mobile app). Private listening often doesn't have sound when starting a program or cuts off mid way through the program. I wish I would have kept my Roku 3.; I don't think it is worth the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Bake

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: After suffering and buffering through three Amazon Fire TV boxes in as many years, I found out it wasn't a sling TV problem, or DirectTV Now problem, it was simply the fact that Amazon Fire TV didn't have enough Jam to produce the results. Now I have a Roku and everything works great!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the remote is significantly weaker than the one that came with my Roku 3.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Sterne III

customer_reviews.title: Washed the remote and it still works.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased well over a year ago. I haven't experienced any technical issues. I can (and have) easily bring with me on trips. I accidentally washed the remote (I'm an idiot) and it still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I have finally jumped on the Roku bandwagon, and I'm glad I did. It was easy to set up, it is easy to operate, and it takes up almost no space. I bought this primarily for use at home, but it is easy to travel with as well. I am very pleased with this device, and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MxRileyQuinn

product_meta.title: Roku Premiere - HD and 4K UHD Streaming Media Player
product_meta.description: Get powerful streaming performance and stunning 4K* resolution at an amazing value. The new Roku Premiere is perfect for HD & 4K Ultra HD TVs. It comes with a fast quad core processor for ultra smooth streaming. Brilliant 4K Ultra HD picture quality immerses you in the action with crisp, life like images that practically jump off the screen. There are no monthly rental fees for owning a Roku Premiere, so you can watch just about anything with access to 450,000+ movie and TV episodes across 4,500+ paid or free channels. Use the free iOS or Android Roku mobile app for voice search, sharing photos, private listening with headphones, and more. TV Compatibility:HD TVs – Up to 1080p (1920 x 1080) with up scaling from 720p,4K UHD TVs – Up to 2160p at 60fps (3840 × 2160) with up scaling from 720p and 1080p *The 4K experience requires a compatible 4K TV and 4K content. 4K content will not be available on all channels.
feature_bullets: Perfect for HD and 4K Ultra HD TVs, features fast quad core processor and 802.11AC dual band wireless
4k ultra HD at 60fps with four times the resolution of 1080p HD, delivering crisp detail and brilliant, life like images
Vibrant HDR displaying an incredible range of colors, brighter whites, and deeper blacks
Enhanced point anywhere remote with headphones for private listening
Unbiased search across top channels. Find where it’s free or cheapest to watch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,332 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
